bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Media Independent Handover Services
IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Media Independent Handover Services
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.21_D11.0, May 2008.pdf

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies IEEE 802 media access-independent mechanisms that optimize handovers between heterogeneous IEEE 802 systems and between IEEE 802 systems and cellular systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
